javadoc:
This class is the container for hashing information about a particular instruction, including all the
 n-grams it is currently involved in within the HashStore.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Build an (unmatched) Instruction, associating it with its position in the basic block

params.name: ind
params.comment: is the index within the block

methods.name: allUnknown
methods.comment: If the -length- instructions, starting with this, are all unmatched, return true;

params.name: length
params.comment: is number of instructions to check

return.comment: true if all checked instructions are unmatched

methods.javadoc: Clear out structures associated with the main sort
methods.name: clearSort
methods.comment: Clear out structures associated with the main sort

methods.javadoc:
Clear out the n-gram array to an uninitialized list
@param sz is the size of the uninitialized list
methods.name: clearNGrams
methods.comment: Clear out the n-gram array to an uninitialized list

params.name: sz
params.comment: is the size of the uninitialized list

name: InstructHash
comment:
This class is the container for hashing information about a particular instruction, including all the
 n-grams it is currently involved in within the HashStore.
